name: SILDENAFIL CITRATE

warningsAndPrecautions: sildenafil tablets usp supplied pale blue blue , caplet shaped film-coated tablets containing sildenafil citrate equivalent nominally indicated amount sildenafil follows : 100 mg - pale blue blue , caplet shaped film-coated tablets , debossed ‘ 1a1 ’ one side plain side . bottles 30 tablets ndc : 80425-0503-01 bottles 60 tablets ndc : 80425-0503-02 bottles 90 tablets ndc : 80425-0503-03 recommended storage : store 25°c ( 77°f ) ; excursions permitted within 15-30°c ( 59-86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] .

indications_original: Sildenafil tablets are indicated for the treatment of erectile dysfunction.
contraindications_original: For most patients, the recommended dose is 50 mg taken, as needed, approximately 1 hour before sexual activity. However, sildenafil tablets may be taken anywhere from 30 minutes to 4 hours before sexual activity ( 2.1 ) Based on effectiveness and toleration, may increase to a maximum of 100 mg or decrease to 25 mg ( 2.1 ) Maximum recommended dosing frequency is once per day ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Sildenafil  tablets USP are supplied as pale blue to blue, caplet shaped film-coated tablets containing sildenafil citrate equivalent to the nominally indicated amount of sildenafil as follows:
                  
                  For 100 mg - Pale blue to blue, caplet shaped film-coated tablets, debossed with  ‘1A1’ on one side and plain on other side.
                  
                  Bottles of 30 Tablets NDC: 80425-0503-01
                  Bottles of 60 Tablets NDC: 80425-0503-02
                  Bottles of 90 Tablets NDC: 80425-0503-03
                  
                  
                     Recommended Storage:Store at 25°C (77°F); excursions permitted within 15-30°C (59-86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
adverseReactions_original: Administration of sildenafil tablets to patients using nitric oxide donors, such as organic nitrates or organic nitrites in any form. Sildenafil tablets was shown to potentiate the hypotensive effect of nitrates ( 4.1 , 7.1 , 12.2 ) Known hypersensitivity to sildenafil or any component of tablet ( 4.2 ) Administration with guanylate cyclase (GC) stimulators, such as riociguat ( 4.3 )
